info.title: FactorTrace API
info.description:
# FactorTrace - Enterprise Carbon Accounting Platform

FactorTrace is a bank-grade SaaS platform for GHG emissions management and
regulatory compliance reporting (ESRS, CDP, TCFD, SBTi).

## Key Features

- **Emissions Tracking**: Calculate and track Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions
- **Database-backed Factors**: Region-specific emission factors from DEFRA, EPA, and custom sources
- **Regulatory Reporting**: Generate ESRS E1 compliant iXBRL reports
- **Data Quality**: GHG Protocol compliant uncertainty analysis

## Authentication

All endpoints require Bearer token authentication:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your_jwt_token>
```

Obtain a token via `POST /api/v1/auth/login`.

## Rate Limiting

- Standard tier: 100 requests/minute
- Enterprise tier: 1000 requests/minute

## Support

- Documentation: https://docs.factortrace.com
- Issues: https://github.com/factortrace/api/issues

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of emission records with optional filtering.

## Filtering Options
- **scope**: Filter by GHG Protocol scope (1, 2, or 3)
- **category**: Filter by emission category (exact match)
- **start_date / end_date**: Filter by creation date range

## Pagination
- **skip**: Number of records to skip (default: 0)
- **limit**: Maximum records to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

Results are sorted by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: Filter records created after this date (ISO 8601)

schema.description: Filter records created before this date (ISO 8601)

schema.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

schema.title: Response Get Emissions Api V1 Emissions  Get

post.description:
Creates a new emission entry and automatically calculates the CO2e amount.

## Factor Resolution Logic
1. **Manual Override**: If `emission_factor` is provided in the payload, it will be used directly
2. **Database Lookup**: Otherwise, the API looks up the emission factor using the combination of:
   - `scope` (1, 2, or 3)
   - `category` (e.g., "Purchased Electricity")
   - `activity_type` (e.g., "Electricity")
   - `country_code` (e.g., "DE" for Germany)
3. **Error**: If no matching factor is found, returns 422 with the lookup key for debugging

## Calculation
The emission amount is calculated as:
```
amount (tCO2e) = activity_data × emission_factor / 1000
```

## Example Use Cases
- **Scope 1 Diesel**: 1000 liters of diesel in DE → ~2.65 tCO2e
- **Scope 2 Electricity**: 10000 kWh in DE → ~3.5 tCO2e
- **Scope 3 Business Travel**: 5000 km flight → varies by class

401.description: Not authenticated - Bearer token missing or invalid

422.description: Emission factor not found - The combination of scope/category/activity_type/country_code has no matching entry in the database

example.detail: No emission factor found for key: (scope_2, Purchased Electricity, Electricity, XX)

get.description:
Returns aggregated emission totals for dashboard displays and reporting.

## Response includes:
- **scope1_total**: Total direct emissions (tCO2e)
- **scope2_total**: Total purchased energy emissions (tCO2e)
- **scope3_total**: Total value chain emissions (tCO2e)
- **total_emissions**: Sum of all scopes (tCO2e)
- **by_category**: Breakdown by emission category

Useful for:
- Dashboard KPI widgets
- Executive summaries
- ESRS E1 reporting data

post.description:
Advanced emissions calculation with uncertainty analysis

Uses the sophisticated calculation engine with Monte Carlo simulation

Calculate emissions for a specific Scope 3 category

Categories: purchased_goods_services, capital_goods, fuel_energy_activities,
upstream_transportation, waste_operations, business_travel, employee_commuting,
upstream_leased_assets, downstream_transportation, processing_sold_products,
use_of_sold_products, end_of_life_treatment, downstream_leased_assets,
franchises, investments

ActivityDataPoint.title: ActivityDataPoint
ActivityDataPoint.description: Single activity data point for calculations

CalculationRequest.title: CalculationRequest
CalculationRequest.description: Request to calculate emissions for a category

ClimateActions.title: ClimateActions
ClimateActions.description: E1-3: Actions and resources related to climate change

ClimatePolicy.title: ClimatePolicy
ClimatePolicy.description: E1-2: Climate change mitigation and adaptation policies

CompanyProfile.title: CompanyProfile
CompanyProfile.description: Company profile for enhanced Scope 3 calculations

DataQualityIndicator.title: DataQualityIndicator
DataQualityIndicator.description: Pedigree matrix for data quality assessment

DataQualityScore.title: DataQualityScore
DataQualityScore.description: Data quality scoring per GHG Protocol

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: GHG Protocol emission scope. 1 = Direct emissions (fuel combustion, company vehicles). 2 = Indirect emissions (purchased electricity). 3 = Value chain emissions.

category.title: Category
category.description: Emission category as defined in the emission factors database. Must match exactly. Examples: 'Purchased Electricity', 'Mobile Combustion', 'Stationary Combustion'.

activity_type.title: Activity Type
activity_type.description: Specific activity type within the category. Must match an entry in the emission factors database. Examples: 'Electricity', 'Diesel', 'Natural Gas'.

activity_data.title: Activity Data
activity_data.description: Quantity of the activity. The unit must match the emission factor's expected unit (e.g., kWh for electricity, liters for diesel).

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Unit of measurement for activity_data. Must be consistent with the emission factor. Common units: 'kWh', 'liters', 'kg', 'm³', 'km'.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for region-specific emission factors. Use 'GLOBAL' for generic factors. Examples: 'DE' (Germany), 'FR' (France), 'US' (United States), 'GB' (United Kingdom).

emission_factor.title: Emission Factor
emission_factor.description: Manual emission factor override in kgCO2e per unit. If provided, bypasses database lookup. Use only when you have a verified custom factor.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description of this emission entry. Useful for audit trails and reporting.

location.title: Location
location.description: Physical location or facility name associated with this emission.

data_source.title: Data Source
data_source.description: Source of the activity data. Examples: 'Utility Invoice', 'Meter Reading', 'Estimate'.

data_quality_score.title: Data Quality Score
data_quality_score.description: Data quality score from 0-100 based on GHG Protocol guidance. Higher is better. Considers temporal, geographical, technological representativeness.

reporting_period.title: Reporting Period
reporting_period.description: Reporting period identifier. Format: 'YYYY' for annual, 'YYYY-QN' for quarterly, 'YYYY-MM' for monthly.

EmissionCreate.title: EmissionCreate
EmissionCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new emission record.

The API will automatically look up the appropriate emission factor from the
database based on scope, category, activity_type, and country_code.
If no matching factor is found, a 422 error is returned.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier for this emission record.

activity_type.title: Activity Type
activity_type.description: Specific activity type within the category.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code used for factor lookup.

emission_factor.title: Emission Factor
emission_factor.description: Emission factor used for calculation in kgCO2e per unit.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Calculated emission amount in tonnes CO2 equivalent (tCO2e). This is the primary result of the calculation.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description of this emission entry.

uncertainty_percentage.title: Uncertainty Percentage
uncertainty_percentage.description: Uncertainty percentage for the calculated emission (±%).

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Timestamp when this record was created (UTC).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Timestamp when this record was last updated (UTC).

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: ID of the user who created this record.

EmissionResponse.title: EmissionResponse
EmissionResponse.description:
Schema for emission record responses.

Contains the calculated emission amount and all associated metadata.
The 'amount' field contains the calculated CO2e in tonnes (tCO2e).

category.title: Category
category.description: Emission category. Must match an entry in the emission factors database.

activity_type.title: Activity Type
activity_type.description: Specific activity type within the category.

activity_data.title: Activity Data
activity_data.description: Quantity of the activity. Updating this will trigger recalculation.

emission_factor.title: Emission Factor
emission_factor.description: Manual emission factor override in kgCO2e per unit.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description of this emission entry.
description.example: Updated: Office building electricity consumption Q1 2024

EmissionUpdate.title: EmissionUpdate
EmissionUpdate.description:
Schema for updating an existing emission record.

All fields are optional. Only provided fields will be updated.
The emission amount will be automatically recalculated if activity_data
or emission_factor changes.

example.description: Updated: Office building electricity consumption Q1 2024

scope1_total.title: Scope1 Total
scope1_total.description: Total Scope 1 emissions in tCO2e (direct emissions).

scope2_total.title: Scope2 Total
scope2_total.description: Total Scope 2 emissions in tCO2e (purchased energy).

scope3_total.title: Scope3 Total
scope3_total.description: Total Scope 3 emissions in tCO2e (value chain).

total_emissions.title: Total Emissions
total_emissions.description: Total emissions across all scopes in tCO2e.

by_category.title: By Category
by_category.description: Emissions breakdown by category in tCO2e. Keys are category names, values are totals.

EmissionsSummary.title: EmissionsSummary
EmissionsSummary.description:
Schema for aggregated emissions summary.

Provides totals by scope and category breakdown for dashboard displays
and regulatory reporting.

GHGBreakdown.title: GHGBreakdown
GHGBreakdown.description: Detailed GHG breakdown by gas type per ESRS E1

implemented.title: Implemented
implemented.description: Whether internal carbon pricing is implemented

Scope3CategoryBreakdown.title: Scope3CategoryBreakdown
Scope3CategoryBreakdown.description: Breakdown of Scope 3 emissions by category
